post.body: you have made me chuckle to the max"!!!!!
hey just a note town at 2 tmrw k? any probs gimme a txt see ya then x
just up, sleeping pills knock me out it was awesome! i really want some pasta but i missed lunch . .i think ive ravioli ^^
yes cake that contains ice cream! erm the spikey ine with the fringe. . . .^^
yeah he was awesome! yeah that style i showed you before ^^ i want ice cream cake!
crunchy nut is the shiz!cant get my hair cut till monday. .but my mums getting me the joker graphic novel for xmas schweet!
the craic is crunchy nut cornflakes and coffee ^^ et tu?
i tried to cut the addiction, went without for a month and was like meh i want it lol i shall get you some for xmas ^^
meow twitter lalalalalalala oooh more diet coke for tish it is a human need ^^
awesome! im still waiting on my twilight hoodie from hot topic! bah .. . ewh cold isnt fun
wicked you got your tee!! on a scale of one to a billion how cool is it???????
also rain it sucks.
hey agredd xmas is quite the unshiz, event. yould gladly take a 2x4 to st nic, but alas i would rather get more coffee x
i drink ALOT of coffee . . . . tea to me is like methadone to a heroin addict . . it just dont cut the mustard
the student support thing . . i wasnt there . . silly people . . .i be innocent and they think so to!
also another thought. im glad to get home for a while. recharge and live for a while. play video games with people i love x
THINK HAPPY THOUGHTS!
